ARABIC: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ هُوَ أَعْلَمُ بِمَن ضَلَّ عَن سَبِيلِهِۦ وَهُوَ أَعْلَمُ بِٱلْمُهْتَدِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Your Lord knows best who is misguided from His Way and He knows best those who are guided.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Verily your Lord knows those who have gone astray from His path, and He knows those who are guided on the way.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Surely your Lord knows well those who have strayed from His Way just as He knows well those who are on the Right Way.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Your Lord knows best who has gone astray from His path and who is rightly guided.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Indeed your Lord well knows those who have strayed from His path, and He well knows those who are upon guidance.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Verily, your Lord is the best Knower of him who has gone astray from His path, and He is the best Knower of those who are guided.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Surely your Lord best knows him who errs from His way, and He best knows the followers of the right course.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Surely thy Lord knows very well those who have gone astray from His way, and He knows very well those who are guided.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! thy Lord is Best Aware of him who strayeth from His way, and He is Best Aware of those who walk aright.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Your Lord knows best who has fallen by the wayside, and who has remained on the true path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily thy Lord! He is the best Knower of him who strayeth from His path, and He is the best Knower of the guided one,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed your Lord knows best those who stray from His way, and He knows best those who are guided.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Verily it is thy Lord that knoweth best, which (among men) hath strayed from His Path: and He knoweth best those who receive (true) Guidance.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Verily, your Lord knows better, who (among men) has gone astray from His Path, and He knows better those who are guided.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Indeed, your Lord knows very well those who strayed from His Path, and those who are guided.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Your Lord knows best who has strayed from His path, and He knows best the well-guided.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, your Lord is most knowing of who has gone astray from His way, and He is most knowing of the [rightly] guided.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [68:7] Assuredly your Lord knows best those who stray from His way, and He knows best those who are guided, to Him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Lo! thy Lord) Muhammad (is best aware of him who strayeth from His way) from His religion, i.e. Abu Jahl and his host, (and He is best aware of those who walk aright) and He is best aware of those who are guided to His religion, i.e. Abu Bakr and his fellow believers.
